price: 13. Mereka tidak beriman kepadanya (Al-Qur`ān) padahal telah berlalu sunnatullah*(433) terhadap orang-orang terdahulu.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: *433). Sunnatullah di sini ialah membinasakan orang yang mendustakan rasul.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
